result.title: Instant Karma
result.content:
Hello everyone,

So few hours back, there were two cheating teams in our room. One of the teams was called Runners and the other was Runners VKCup. You see, nothing suspicious on first glance. So these teams used the same codes to pass A's pretests but me and my friend Radoslav hacked them both â€” 1, 2 :D

In the end, one of these teams managed to accept A for 75 points. I would normally ask for making their round unrated but they actually lost rating so this sounds like a better punishment :D
